abstract: Fall of Kathleen G Kane, Pennsylvania attorney general accused of multiple crimes including perjury, has been startlingly rapid, disappointing Democrats who saw her as potential challenger to Republican Sen Patrick J Toomey; Kane has relentlessly attacked political enemies, angering some who have helped bring charges against her.
lead_paragraph: Attorney General Kathleen G. Kane, the first woman in the post, says criminal charges against her are part of a campaign by opponents angered because she exposed them.

headline.main: Fall in Fortunes for Pennsylvania Attorney General
headline.print_headline: A Rapid Fall for a Rising Pennsylvania Political Star

snippet: Attorney General Kathleen G. Kane, the first woman in the post, says criminal charges against her are part of a campaign by opponents angered because she exposed them.
